resources.string: This activity would show recently played songs but also menu to choose from different button below"
This activity would list all the artists which you have available with search button
This activity would list all the albums which you have available with search button
This activity would list all the items from global list of availability to search and possibility to buy it when payment button is clicked

The PayPal Mobile Payment Libraries (MPL) provides a secure, extensible, and scalable way to add PayPal functionality to your native mobile apps. Using MPL, you place a Pay with PayPal button in your apps payment flow
currently playing song with artist and album name
